hooks.command: bash -c 'BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ "$BRANCH" = "main" ]; then echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\", \"reason\": \"⚠️  Warning: Editing on main branch. Consider using a feature branch.\"}"; else echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\"}"; fi'
bash -c 'if grep -rn "unsafe" --include="*.rs" "$1" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "// SAFETY:" | head -1; then echo "⚠️  Warning: Found unsafe block without // SAFETY: comment"; fi' --
